description: Removes previously created Windows Firewall rules that were blocking a specific application. Accepts the application name used during blocking and deletes the associated inbound and outbound rules. Logs all actions and outputs a JSON report for SOC automation.

script_parameters.name: MaxWaitSeconds
script_parameters.description: Maximum wait time for the script execution. Defaults to 300 seconds.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Path where the active response JSON result will be stored. Uses overwrite-safe NDJSON logging.

user_prompts.prompt: Enter the application name used during blocking
user_prompts.description: Application name originally provided when creating the block rule. Required to identify and remove the associated firewall rules.
